markdown.markdown:
```{r, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE} params<-list( version= '0.2', modules = c( 'Data, Plotting, Pre-processing, Statistics, Clustering, Dimensional reduction, Pathway analysis, Predictive modeling, Network analysis, Reporting')) library(shiny) library(dave.help) mods<-parse_modules(params$modules) # htmltools::tagList(rmarkdown::html_dependency_font_awesome()) # required for icons ``` `r module_title('DAVe: Data Analysis and Visualization engine')` ![](img/dave.main/full.png){.center} ##### DAVe, application interactively combines statistics, clustering, data exploration and visualization with machine learning, functional and network analysis to create information and context rich mapped networks. The following manual describes a selection of available workflows. Get ready to connect your data with context!
![](img/dave.main/nav.png){.center} ### Modules ##### DAVe is comprised of `r mods$length` modules covering: `r grammatical_paste(mods$modules) %>% tolower()` domains. Each module contains a `calculate`, `explore`, `plot` and `report` components. ### Actions #### `r dcr_gr('Calculate')`
##### This tab is used to set the method options and view the results summary and tabular output. ![](img/dave.ml/model/results.png){.center} #### `r dcr_gr('Explore')`
##### Interactively explore the results. ![](img/dave.main/explore.png){.center} #### `r dcr_gr('Plot')`
##### View and tune your data visualizations. ![](img/dave.main/plot.png){.center} #### `r dcr_gr('Report')`
##### Create data analysis summaries and reproducible reports. ![](img/dave.main/dave_report.png){.center}
